EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (IC Offering) (1365779861.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (IC Offering) (1365779861.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Clelia, I am so sorry to hear you have been sick – how awful! I just left you a voicemail; I will be here if you would like to connect before the call at 12 today. If not, please feel free to schedule a time on my calendar by clicking here <https://www.timetrade.com/app/td-73133/workflows/8slys/schedule/welcome?view=full&fs=1&wfsid=b07a7e70-baba97f6-b07a7e73-baba97f6-00000002-b9pdbem2q3ikgd205g8irppsq0> and we will connect next week. Best to you!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Clelia Peters [mailto:cleliapeters@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, April 12, 2013 9:48 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Call Summary (IC Offering) Sara, Before we have our call with Gene today I wanted to touch base about the benefits options you sent through - apologies that I have not done this before, I've still been really sick in the past week. It would be great to talk through the expenses outlined - maybe we can set up time to do this next week? I am also around this morning before our call. In the meantime, I wanted to provide an update on our incorporation process: we are still working on this and it looks like it will take another week or two. Realistically, I don't think we will have an entity in place to pay me formally until April. Thanks and I look forward to spraking soon. CleliaOn Apr 5, 2013 4:03 PM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Clelia, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - You can join MBO’s LinkedIn in group by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=71161&mostPopular=&trk=tyah&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - I have attached the net cash estimate we created on the phone, please give me a quick ring to review when you have a moment. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeF1cuU53%2B%2FmNJ7v%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
